marklogic.body:
Wow...CNN is keeping the comment line for this story open longer than most! A poll cannot determine guilt in the United States. In case CNN has forgotten, the U.S. Constitution, which CNN hides behind all the time for Freedom of the Press, also guarantees Innocent UNTIL Proven Guilty! CNN seems to think it can hold a trial in the arena of public opinion. They tried it with the Casey case and was Burned. CNN should remember that with the right to freedom of the press, there is a responisibility to accurately report a story and not become the story. I believe the term is journalistic integrity. I realize that may be a hard phrase for anyone at CNN (or Fox News for that matter) to say but it is such a very important issue when reporting to the American people. I do wonder how far CNN has strayed from Ted Turner's vision.
Quick poll: How many people think CNN should be taken Off the air (given a time out) until they learn to properly report stories?
